gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.decorate

Class SmartTick

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.decorate.SmartTick

  • public class SmartTick
extends Object

    This class provides a set of functions for creating intelligent automatic time and data tickmarks for plots.

    Author:
    Dan Cervelli

      • autoTick

        public static double[] autoTick(double min,
                double max,
                int ticks,
                boolean expand)
        Shortcut for autoTick(min, max, ticks, expand, false)
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum
        max - the maximum
        ticks - the desired number of ticks
        expand - whether or not to expand the range for more "pleasant"
        Returns:
        an array containing the values of the ticks

      • autoTick

        public static double[] autoTick(double min,
                double max,
                int tickCountRequested,
                boolean expand,
                boolean clip)
        Generates ticks over an arbitrary range. The algorithm computes stepMult.length sets of ticks and chooses the one with the number of ticks closest to what is requested. If you specify the expand property the ticks returned will be slightly smaller and larger than the minimum and maximum specified, otherwise the ticks will be inclusive to min and max.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum axis value
        max - the maximum axis value
        tickCountRequested - the desired number of ticks
        expand - whether or not to expand the range for more "pleasant" ticks
        clip - clip the last ticks to the min/max values
        Returns:
        an array containing the values of the ticks

      • intervalTick

        public static double[] intervalTick(double min,
                    double max,
                    int ticks)
        Generate array of tick values
        Parameters:
        min - min interval malue
        max - max interval value
        ticks - ticks count

      • autoTimeTick

        public static Object[] autoTimeTick(Date ts,
                    Date te,
                    int ticks)
        Generates time ticks over a specified time interval. The ticks parameter is a suggestion: it is not guaranteed to produce that many ticks.
        Parameters:
        ts - the start time as a Date
        te - the end time as a Date
        ticks - the desired number of ticks
        Returns:
        the dates (in j2ksecs) of the ticks

      • autoTimeTick

        public static Object[] autoTimeTick(double ts,
                    double te,
                    int ticks)
        Generates time ticks over a specified time interval. The ticks parameter is a suggestion: it is not guaranteed to produce that many ticks.
        Parameters:
        ts - the start time as a j2ksec
        te - the end time as a j2ksec
        ticks - the desired number of ticks
        Returns:
        the dates (in j2ksecs) of the ticks
